settings.worktitle: Cast Your NFT in 3 Easy Step

settings.title: Endless Possibilities
settings.description: We believe that experiences are made from everlasting memories. What better way to create those experiences than with an immersive piece of art. Create a beautiful experience in your home with help from Divine. We make it easy and convenient.

settings.title: Intelligent engagement
settings.description: From sound to touch and even 3D capability, our Non-Fungible Tokens create unforgettable modern-day experiences. Turn any space in your home into an interactive crypto NFT art gallery. With our beyond easy set-up, seamlessly pair your wallet and cast your NFTs – that’s it!
Project your favorite Non-Fungible Token art on the go with the Apollo portable projector. Our small but powerful projector is about the size of...
Do you want to take the quality of the entertainment in your home to a whole new level? Create the ultimate NFT art experience...
It’s always good to have choices and more choices. To ensure a great fit in any space, the Vulcan touch display comes in two...

settings.title: Worldwide Delivery
settings.description: We ship portraits globally with fully tracked shipping methods.

settings.title: Unlimited Revisions
settings.description: You get to preview your artwork once it's ready, and you can request any changes you like before we print your order.

settings.title: Top Customer Support
settings.description: Our customer support team work 24/7 via email, as well as live chat. We're very quick to help, and we all love pets!

settings.title: Upload photo
settings.description: A well lit pet photo will work best.

settings.title: Approve Art
settings.description: Approve your art and select a background in around 2 days

settings.title: Show Off
settings.description: Watch your friends be jealous

settings.title:
When your artwork is ready, 
preview it on dozens of backgrounds 
and pick your favorite!
Endless Backgrounds to Choose From
settings.description: Here is where you can browse all the background options we offer. When your artwork is completed, you can preview and select any of these patterned or solid colour backgrounds, or have no background. Once you approve the artwork and pick your background, we print your product!
settings.footer_title: We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee on all artwork and unlimited revisions. We don’t print your product until you’re happy!

settings.content_subtitle: Our Wag & Purr team is here to help!
settings.footer_description: For media inquires, email us at hello@popmypet.co

settings.text:
Your NFT art and collectibles should not be kept hidden away in your wallet. Instead, they should be used to turn your walls into a dynamic, personalized gallery that completely customizes your space. Your home should be as unique as you are. Divine is here to help!

Let's take your NFT art and make it physically digital or as we like to say, phygital.

settings.title: Never Miss A new Feature
settings.description:
Subscribe to receive software updates, news & giveaways.
We hate spam just as much as you.

settings.heading: Why Divine?
settings.content:
From phone to frame,
enjoy all of your NFTs with ease

settings.title: NFTs come alive
settings.description: We believe experiences are made from memories that last a lifetime. From sound to touch and even 3D capability, our devices are made for modern-day experiences. Turn any space into an interactive gallery for all of your senses. Simply pair your wallet and cast your Non-Fungible Tokens. Just like that, you’re ready to bring your NFT art alive. It’s easy and absolutely unforgettable.

settings.title: Intelligent updates
settings.description: The NFTs crypto space is rapidly changing and growing. Through it all, Divine devices stay ready and stable. Frequent updates are pushed for free to increase capability, performance, and safety. We keep your devices constantly up to date and free of glitches or headaches. Use our easy interface to cast between your Divine devices.

settings.title:
From your wallet to your wall,
enjoy all of your NFTs with ease.
Explore our devices
settings.description: From portable to durable, there's a style fit for you

settings.heading: CONTACT US
settings.content: For general inquiries or questions regarding sales or press, please leave your contact information below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

settings.title: A powerful projector that fits in your palm
settings.title-second:
Project your favorite NFTs up to 200” on-the-go or at home with Apollo. About the size of a soda can, and as light as an iPhone, Apollo can create a gallery whenever and wherever you want.

Main features

settings.question: Where does it come from?
settings.answer: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.

settings.question: What is Lorem Ipsum?
settings.answer: The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.
